quagga.input.subject: Re: Bridgeline Gas Marketing, LLC
quagga.input.body:
Sure, I have a meeting w/ Mark at 3.  Other than that, I'm open.



	Sara Shackleton@ECT
	06/07/2000 09:52 AM
		 
		 To: jason.peters@enron.com
		 cc: 
		 Subject: Re: Bridgeline Gas Marketing, LLC

Jason:  fyi.  Also, Randy Curry did call me yesterday but wasn't available 
when I returned the call.
Also, let's get Sakura Dellsher executed (and we should create a file since 
we're noting the ADM agreement which we did for Bridgeline).  Could we please 
talk this afternoon about outstanding agreements?  ss
----- Forwarded by Sara Shackleton/HOU/ECT on 06/07/2000 09:49 AM -----

	Brant Reves
	06/07/2000 09:10 AM
		
		 To: Sara Shackleton/HOU/ECT@ECT
		 cc: 
		 Subject: Re: Bridgeline Gas Marketing, LLC

hello Sara,

I think this should be a high priority once they take on an ISDA attorney.  
Per your recommendation, I contacted Randy Curry, President of Bridgeline and 
passed along your thoughts about Jason.  I gave him your phone number and he 
sounded enthusiastic about wanting to talk with him.  God knows they need an 
attorney.

Right now, I think we can take this off the priority list.

Thanks
Brant




From: Sara Shackleton on 06/06/2000 11:16 AM
To: Brant Reves/HOU/ECT@ECT
cc:  
Subject: Bridgeline Gas Marketing, LLC

Brant:  Is this really high priority (for our legal/credit discussions)?  We 
haven't heard from these guys since April 13.  Sara
